name: Mysterious Realms RPG
description: Engage in unique Crystal-based combat you haven't seen before. Slay enemies, overcome events and empower your party to conquer the world of mystery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
